enable_program.name: Enable program
enable_program.description: Enable a Smart Hose Timer program.

program_id.name: Program
program_id.description: The program to enable (select a Program sensor entity).

disable_program.name: Disable program
disable_program.description: Disable a Smart Hose Timer program.

program_id.name: Program

update_program.name: Update program
update_program.description: Update a Smart Hose Timer program

days_of_week.name: Days of Week
days_of_week.description: List of day numbers (0=Sunday, 6=Saturday). Only one scheduling type can be used: days_of_week, interval_days, even_days, or odd_days.

interval_days.name: Interval Days
interval_days.description: Number of days between runs (1-365). Only one scheduling type can be used: days_of_week, interval_days, even_days, or odd_days.

even_days.name: Even Days
even_days.description: Run on even-numbered days of the month. Only one scheduling type can be used: days_of_week, interval_days, even_days, or odd_days.

odd_days.name: Odd Days
odd_days.description: Run on odd-numbered days of the month. Only one scheduling type can be used: days_of_week, interval_days, even_days, or odd_days.

runs.name: Runs
runs.description: List of daily run configurations. Each run specifies when to water (start_time OR sun_event) and which valves to use.
